holidays.title: Alfred Hitchcock Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the master of nerve-wracking suspense, twist endings, and psychologically complex characters.

holidays.description: Celebrate with Mexico’s Nahua communities today. Read on for more on this holiday.

holidays.title: Independence Day Mauritius
holidays.description: Celebrate all things Mauritian with our informative article about this Mauritian public holiday.

holidays.description: Join over 30 countries to promote healthy eating for children in school and at home today.

holidays.title: IUGR Awareness Day
holidays.description: IUGR Awareness Day helps to create awareness and spread information about the condition.

holidays.title: National Baked Scallops Day
holidays.description: Are you hungry yet? We have fun scallop-based stories to go with your scallop dinner!

holidays.title: National Christian Day
holidays.description: Hey, Christian. Yours is a name associated with holiness and fashion. What’s your secret?

holidays.title: National Plant a Flower Day
holidays.description: Grab those seed packets, wear flowers in your hair — it’s time for some gardening!

holidays.title: National Working Mom's day
holidays.description: Learn how this day came to be and the best ways to celebrate it!

holidays.title: Popcorn Lover's Day
holidays.description: Prepare your bowls and taste buds, and let's start popping those kernels!

holidays.title: World Day Against Cyber Censorship
holidays.description: Take control of the websites and information you may access on the internet.

holidays.title: World Glaucoma Day
holidays.description: Put your glasses on and discover all there is to know about these eye diseases.

holidays.title: Liza Minnelli’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s a powerful actress, singer, and performer who earned her iconic status.
